Look&Feel.title: Color
Look&Feel.description: Create color palettes with the color wheel, hex or image. Browse thousands of color combinations for usage in Photoshop, Illustrator etc.

Look&Feel.title: Color Palettes for Designers and Artists - Color Hunt
Look&Feel.description: Discover the newest hand-picked color palettes of Color Hunt. Get color inspiration for your design and art projects.

Look&Feel.title: ロゴメーカーとロゴクリエーター - 無料のオンラインロゴジェネレーター
Look&Feel.description: 無料ロゴメーカーツールを使うと、数分でオリジナルのロゴを作成できます。無料のベクター、フォント、アイコンを選択して、独自のロゴをデザインしましょう。ビジネスのロゴをオンラインで作成する、最も簡単な方法です。

Look&Feel.title: Free Clip Art Images & Vector Illustrations For Your Website
Look&Feel.description: Explore a beautiful library of royalty-free clipart vector images and illustrations in PNG, SVG formats. Free clipart for commercial use.

Look&Feel.title: Blush: みんなのためのイラスト
Look&Feel.description: Blushを使用すると、ご自分のデザインに無料のイラストを簡単に追加できます。世界中のアーティストが作成した完全にカスタマイズ可能なグラフィックで遊んでみましょう。

Look&Feel.title: Linustock
Look&Feel.description: Web・DTPデザイナーたちの要望からできたシンプルで使いやすい「イラスト一覧 」の無料（フリー）線画イラスト素材

Look&Feel.title: Unsplash
Look&Feel.description: Beautiful, free images and photos that you can download and use for any project. Better than any royalty free or stock photos.

Look&Feel.title: Free Stock Photos: High-Res Images for Websites
Look&Feel.description: Browse thousands of beautiful copyright-free images. All our pictures are free to download for personal and commercial use, no attribution required.

Look&Feel.title: Free stock photos - Kaboompics
Look&Feel.description: Find the best free stock images. Download all images and use them in your projects.

Develop.title: Regex101
Develop.description: Regex101 allows you to create, debug, test and have your expressions explained for PHP, PCRE, Python, Golang and JavaScript. The website also features a community where you can share useful expressions.

Develop.title: Wolfram|Alpha

Develop.title: Unicode Character Table
Develop.description: Unicode web service for character search. Find, copy and paste your favorite characters: 😎 Emoji, ❤ Hearts, 💲 Currencies, → Arrows, ★ Stars and many others 🚩

Web.title: GTmetrix
Web.description: GTmetrix is a free tool that analyzes your page's speed performance.  Using PageSpeed and YSlow, GTmetrix generates scores for your pages and offers actionable recommendations on how to fix them.

Web.title: Placeholder.com
Web.description: What Is Placeholder.com? Placeholder.com generates custom placeholder images on the fly, like these examples:-     How To Use Our Placeholders Just specify the image size after our url (https://via.placeholder.com/) and you'll get a placeholder image.

Web.title: urlscan.io
Web.description: Website scanner for suspicious and malicious URLs

Web.title: Mozilla Observatory
Web.description: The Mozilla Observatory is a project designed to help developers, system administrators, and security professionals configure their sites safely and securely.

Draw.title: draw.io

Draw.title: Graphtoy

Draw.title: Pixlr.com

Inspiration.title: Behance
